sub_topic.name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
sub_topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond) in Counting & Cardinality (Mathematics)

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Identify and write numerals from 0 to 20.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the value of a digit based on its position.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Recall the sequence of numbers forward and backward (0-20).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Recognize patterns in the number system to 1,000.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Read and write multi-digit whole numbers using numerals and number names.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Count aloud to 100 by ones and tens.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Match a numeral to a group of objects.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the concept of infinity in counting.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the necessity of complex number systems.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Compare large numbers up to one million.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the classification of numbers (Natural, Whole, Integers).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Connect number recognition to the real number line including negatives.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the distinction between countable and uncountable sets.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Construct arguments regarding the density of real numbers.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Foundational Math & Arithmetic (Number Sense and Early Reasoning)
objectives.sub_topic_name: Number Recognition (0–20, then to 100, then beyond)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize set theory notation with number recognition.
